Title: The Fox and the Hound
Director: Ted Berman, Richard Rich, Art Stevens, David Hand, Wolfgang Reitherman
Writer: Daniel P. Mannix (based on the book by), Larry Clemmons (story), Ted Berman (story), David Michener (story), Peter Young (story), Burny Mattinson (story), Steve Hulett (story), Earl Kress (story), Vance Gerry (story)
Actors: Mickey Rooney, Kurt Russell, Pearl Bailey, Jack Albertson
Plot: When an adopted fox and a to-be hunting hound become inspepearable friends as pups, their friendship grows stronger every day in their "childhood." But as they grow older, they grow farther and farther apart, to the day when the two old comrades bond is put the ultimate test.
